column4: Hi all, I have a very silly friend who tryed to fix his windows machine by reinstalling via the built in automated installer. Then realised he had formatted his whole drive and reinstalled and forgettin to backup his family photos. Which program would you recommend me using to track down deleted files?
you don't get the names back, but you could (try and) recover like *.jpg
photorec is part of testdisk - but for files instead of partitions
